sentence: The staff was very welcoming and always acted promptly to any request
The personnel were always friendly and available
The hotel was very spacious and staff very friendly
Comfortable room excellent food efficient service fitness center fast internet convenient location with gorgeous ocean views
In fact the friendly helpful approach by all the personnel is a major strong point of this hotel
The staff are very pleasant and helpful
The staff were great and always ready to help very close to beach and no more than a half hour walk to anywhere central
Restaurant located overlooking sea provides great menu atmosphere and service
We have just come back from here it has wonderful spa facilities very clean and courteous staff
the service is excelent and people are kind
The front desk was always backed up not because they were not doing a good job but it seemed they just needed more people there
We must mention Tihana at reception
Beach food options could be more varied but staff were working super hard
Loved the seating areaThe laundry service was a bit expensive
Shade by pool was removed due to somewhat higher winds F4 5 meaning families relocated to indoor pool staff at indoor pool then seemed unhappy to have so many children
Reception area big and bland but breakfast and pool areas very nice
Little bit disappointed with the gril bar and room service food but overall it is a value for the money
The only 2 things which we ate at the hotel were the room service Red Thai curry and vegetarian club sandwich which we only ordered because it rained so much during our stay and breakfast

Renata at the front desk was similarly excellent and offered a high level of customer serviceThe staff at the beach club unfortunately were very inattentive and not of a standard of service expected from a five star hotel
The hotel is comfortable good food and service but a little pricy
The level of service is far from what you would expect from a Radison Blu or a hotel in Croatia in which you pay CHF 68 for 3 nights
